bow: lost interest in my dog after my child was born 20 months ago lost all interest in my dog like all interest my stepkids who live with us take care of him by taking him on walks feeding him and playing in the backyard still take care of him as well but do feel the same anyone else was definitely one of those ftms who said still love and take care of my dogs post birth still love them the same but honest in that don dedicate as much time to them as would like to or should now that my daughter is it getting easier to include them in activities and time spent as family you should make an effort you owe it to your pet nope my dog is still my best friends and gives me all the cuddles when my daughter kicks me and pulls my hair she is the best friend of my kid and helps me wake her up every morning we don go out as often but she gets all the yummy left overs from baby that rain over her head maybe little invested in my pets but honestly can imagine parenting without my cat and my dog my love for them got better the way they interact with my daughter how happy they are ect did realize could love something more then my cat after my daughter but can imagine life without them my dog is awesome with my daughter and love him even more for it sometimes slack with the walks and stuff he smaller dog but that always happened when my life gets crazy think about rehoming your pet before you start really not taking care of it pet deserves love not indifference they re not toys it deserves better than an owner that suddenly lost interest you owe him that at the very least find the dog good loving home treated my dog like my baby until had my own actual baby feel bad know it not the same between us but still throw the ball for him and give him head pats in the same boat have month old now and as much as still love my dogs just don have any interest in them atm not sure if it the hormones but they just annoy me or are an inconvenience hate that feel that way but maybe it just the adjustment trying to make during this time of change hopefully can find balance between being new to motherhood and being the dog mom was feeling the same way about my cat have two cats and one of them comes to me for love and attention and seems happy but my other cat isn adjusting well and don take time to give him the attention he needs and he doesn seem super happy hate to think of rehoming him but struggling because feeling not giving him what he needs to be happy yep feel the same way about my cats loved them like they were my babies until had my own they had to go live with my mil because the only rental apartments we could find didn take pets so they re being well loved but do feel bad that don love them like once did have cats and am worried about how they are going to react to the baby they follow me everywhere when am home and fight over sitting on my lap my one cat comes into the bathroom every time pee they both sleep next to me at night on either side they re just going to need to learn to take more of backseat and am little concerned about how the adjustment period will go am moving into new house and when do that think will close my door at night so they get used to not sleeping with me do plan to cosleep with my infant but do have basinette that will be next to the bed and do want them jumping on the baby in the middle of the night lol they just love it when baby makes it rain my dog is indifferent towards my baby can wait for him to start eating real food and for him to make it rain so the dog likes him more haha exact same with my cat we stopped letting her sleep with us few months pre pregnancy due to allergies and remember being so sad about it spent my first night alone and she kept trying to cuddle with me and feel guilty to say it was annoying me my cat used to be my pride and joy but now avoid touching her because don want to get cat hair on my week old the fact that my dog does like my kid and pregnant again makes it to where not able to spend as much time with him he just ca stand for my daughter to touch him or try to play with him at all something could have known when got him as puppy six years ago when was childless so do want to risk him snapping at her and keep them separate he definitely seems depressed now but the weather being too hot for walks is helping anything we go in the morning when it cool but that not enough we re going to have to transition him to dog house when the weather is better because wo have skittish dog in my tiny mother in law cottage with two kids it just asking for trouble rehoming him would be even crueler than him being ignored little bit for now he be looking for us for his whole life wondering when we were coming back for him just could do that but wo endanger my children either he dog at the end of the day not my kid anyway you re not alone and do let people make you feel like bad person at all hormones made me hate my pets and find them repulsive during pregnancy and then after it just became annoyance at having more living creatures to take care of after long day with the baby need to remember that the dog never asked for this transition and he had no way of letting us know that kids make him nervous before we got pregnant we re all just figuring it out together it good that you see what happening so you can try to give your dog little more attention and love but do be too hard on yourself yeah get it my dog and used to snuggle in bed every morning when my husband got in the shower now usually baby wakes us up but every once in while still invite her to snuggle up when have few minutes and shes so happy yes this 100 it totally ok to admit that your kid is your priority and you need to put your energy to your daughter finding home for your dog could relieve the stress of feeling like you re disinterested and ensuring your dog gets everything he she needs think it really common to feel how you re feeling think how sidelined your hobbies are too as my kids have gotten older it been easier to spend more time with and feel more bonded to my pets again plus my pets adore my kids now that they re older and that another way my pets get love removed love my dog too but it not in my capacity to take care of her besides the bare minimum same we got puppy while was preggers horrible idea do do it and all my maternal feelings were focused on him at first then transferred to my human baby it hard having baby and dog they are like interrupting all the happy baby time and eating baby most adorable stuffies gawd but we re cool now the dog and finally got to bond again after baby became more independent my dogs also behave much better at home when treat them like dogs and not children lol it makes me love them even more when they are very good boys feel the same have puggle and lab the lab has no chill and has to be on you near you licking you gets up every time you get up just so touched out by my toddler want nothing to do with her if she would just lay down and stay which she can do but doesn last long wouldn be so annoyed we have big back yard with horses so they stink too do what you can to give them some attention but at the end of the day they are just animals yep my poor cat who used to sit on my lap every evening and get loads of treats doesn get look in these days hahaha there was year or so that my baby and my dog shared toys my little boy would get small stuffie and my yorkie mix would steal it and vice versa lol glad not alone here feel the exact same way about our dog and it the same situation right now baby will be here in few weeks and it so frustrating we try to at least take him to dog day care on weekly basis since it way too hot to walk him no matter what time of day it is we re in the desert feel the same and thought never love my dog less and was horrified by the people who told me would well here we are yes once had my daughter all of sudden my brain flipped switch and was like ohh this is baby that is dog also feel bad but he still gets lots of attention and sleeps in our bed feel the same about my kitties they are so needy amp they are my shadows want them to feel as loved as my baby good luck to us my boyfriend has dog that he got before we started dating and living together but when moved in the dog attached to me and liked him okay more of cat person but after having my daughter just really grew to dislike him and pretty much all dogs wasn crazy about dogs in the first place but after having baby just really have disliked them not sure why but am never mean or abusive whatsoever rehoming would be lot less cruel than taking house dog and suddenly forcing them to be an outside dog think about it you are the center of attention and suddenly you are not and then you get kicked out of your nice warm safe home by the people you trust the most if you find responsible person who could take him so that he is once again the center of attention the love of someone elses life that has the time to put into him and keep him safe and warm in their home would be better he would be happier and so would you yes absolutely yes after had my daughter not only lost interest in my cats resented them the minor annoyance of midnight meowing turned into source of rage for me post baby the cats who had lived in child free home for nearly decade also developed jealousy issues and started peeing pooping everywhere in the house ended up rehoming them something didn think ever do and honestly judged others in the past for doing the same but couldn take it anymore and it was becoming safety issue for my daughter as she got mobile and they would swipe hiss at her my kid will always take priority same grew up with dogs and could imagine one not in my life now with having baby all can see is the slobber and dog hair everywhere when visiting friends who have them never really minded it before it was just part of having dog now being mom do want extra stuff to have to clean still think they re cute just not right for my family right now exactly my dog isn treated badly but he was as my husband says demoted to dog currently going through allergy testing to get shots because after gave birth apparently my body decided to go overboard and now allergic to my first babies so yes ve lost interest home all day everyday and barely pet them because it just leads to making things worse here to hoping over time we can all get back into that same love again promise he wo be looking for you his whole life he dog you and he would be happier if he found home with people who have the time desire to devote to him life on chain or in pen is fair to him and assure you he ll feel the negatives of that more than if he found himself in new home momming is hard do make it harder by allowing guilt that does exist to stop from doing the best albeit it hard thing for you and the dog it happened with my cat about months out and just can stand being in the same room with her like still love her just don want anything to do with her not sure how to explain it feel horrible about it but ever since getting pregnant my patience for her has gone out the window and now that have month old who constantly needs my full attention just can find it in me to waste energy on her my husband and baby love her too and they give her plenty of attention so know she not being neglected or anything when had my first child had my dog for about years probably had less patience and time for him initially but he was still my baby and it got better as my daughter got older he was sweet boy and gentle soul he passed away last fall and still cry about him occasionally if you ve emotionally replaced your pet you might need to check yourself little and realize that you are betraying an innocent animal that thrives on nothing as much as your love and attention would encourage you to either make the effort or find him loving home no dog deserves to just be background noise in your life he is usually outside during the day anyway just not right now because it 107 degrees outside he ll sleep inside even with dog house but even if he did it does get very cold where we live even in the dead of winter just because he have dog house does mean just act like he does exist anymore it would actually be better than the setup he has now think it unrealistic to think that people should just rehome their pets when they get pregnant there no way for dog to be the center of attention when you have kids but that does mean you ca adjust things to accommodate everyone in your new changing family could not have known my dog does like kids when got him and so now have to make changes for his comfort and the safety of my children still love him he still needs us and loves us and there no reason he ca be apart of my family just because it has been the perfect transition we still take as good care of him as we did before and he is the one who *wants* to be away from my daughter be so happy if he sit in the living room with us again but he refuses if the baby is around which is always he has liked her since we brought her home from the hospital but my daughter is only 14 months old we are just going to give up on our pup without trying to acclimate him truly believe rehoming him would be traumatic for him right now he inconvenienced and feeling slightly left out at most can live with that can live with the downvotes too even though not liking the comment is not what downvoting is for there nothing wrong with finding your pet good home especially if you know you ca provide it anymore re homed my cat last year for this very reason gotten him years ago when was single and after having baby and getting new dog it was clear that he was happy anymore my formally snuggly social cat started hiding in the dark basement all day found him home with little old retired lady where he could watch birds on her deck and snuggle all day she kept me updated and know without doubt that he is getting the life he deserves with her agree that you could not have known he wouldnt like kids and my rehoming opinion is not based on the fact that you are pregnant you said you can not have him snapping at your kids agree 100 so if this is fear of yours and its very valid fear maybe it would be best to rehome what happens to him when the kids go out to play but its just my opinion no judgement your dog your family but didnt want you to feel it would be cruel to rehome him he does live on chain he in my kitchen right now eating turkey pieces just keep him separate from my daughter because he does like her or feel comfortable around her he ll be happier running around in the big backyard during the day weather permitting than behind babygate in my tiny kitchen these comments about my perfectly fine dog wellbeing are little melodramatic if you ask me you are not alone my feelings didn change right away but all the pets especially the big dog feel like just one more thing that need my care one more thing that clean up after one more thing that cost money my feeling towards that cats aren quite the same as they are fairly independent but it still one more thing we ll definitely cross that bridge if and when we come to it he has never acted like he going to snap at her yet not at all he just tries desperately to get away from her and since she does understand boundaries to make him more comfortable and to take my fears out of the equation keep them seperate if he were to act aggressive would hesitate to look for loving and active home for him but he never been aggressive to anyone and do feel like it necessary to give up on adjusting him to the situation just yet like seriously he fine do know what wrote in my comment to be getting so many comments and downvotes but it surprises me that moms do understand that am trying to keep everyone in my home safe and comfortable no one is being neglected or abused it just transition 20 minutes ago found out that for the last hours my dog electric fence was on and the setting was meter from our kitchen it because my husband always sets it up not me messed up the settings when the plug came out of the wall and somehow broke it fixed it wrongly and my dog was getting zapped when leaving the kitchen over the last hours while grandparents were here and we were at movie omg traumatized because traumatized my dog no words to me your post just seemed like you were overwhelmed young child baby on the way and dog that doesnt care for kids then it appeared that you were putting alot more on yourself by stating he would look for you forever if you rehomed simply wanted you to know he would be ok that sometimes rehoming is the best thing the extra details help sincerely hope it works out for your family and that dog and kids eventually have the best relationship sorry if came at you my original comment seems to have gotten me in trouble and guess feeling defensive thank you for this bit of positive feedback and understanding yes same boat my sons year and still barely care still take care of our dog but for some reason don feel the same way don feel like dog lover at all anymore it almost like my brain only has enough room to dedicate to one thing and it sacrificed dog for baby for me it was just survival mode and time where the squeaky wheel gets the grease and my dog understood this was years ago he got that our home life had changed and he was our only kid anymore honestly he was the only that really understood me at that time he was needy knew instinctively when needed space or when needed warmth he passed last summer but so thankful for the time had with him this thread makes me so sad each to their own but please re home your pets if you don have any interest in them my cat has been with me for 10 years and no way in hell will she be neglected with love she was my first baby and my best friend worked in shelter and saw so many pets being surrendered because of new baby find her new home please pets have feelings too and sure she hurting and confused call my dog the forgotten child lol she still in every room and hanging out with us still love her let neighborhood kids walk her for bucks now think nice things like that and an occasional treat make her happy this is normal imo bc dogs are just dogs compared to your kids you love them but just not the same as prior to kids still love my pupper all could focus on for those first couple months was feeding the baby and trying to catch some sleep my dog suffered during those months starting to spend more time with the dog now that the baby is months it getting better with time just some words of encouragement guess no offense taken and you re mom get used to not having the most popular opinion 😃but really dont let the negative get to you it just downvotes you argued your case perfectly though and seems you have plan good luck my cat still slept in our room she was really good about her place on my pillow and staying away from the bassinet when baby was in there mean if he wasn she was all about it but she didn want to share actually really glad didn keep her out of our room because she died when my son was six months rather suddenly even though the newborn times were crazy am glad got those last snuggles with my sweet girl had to give up my cats before the baby was born with dad not participating and trying to take care of very needy baby all alone it was kind of relief not to have pets too know my dogs and cat were confused at first with baby at home but they adapted to the newborn months they all still matter to me my cat would sleep in my lap while rocked my son getting the snuggles when she could she was very patient with my son trying to let her when she died suddenly this winter took the day off work still cry occasionally about her my dogs go on walks with my son in the stroller we take the little one then our big one and my son tries to hold the leash my son even has started getting the milkbones whenever open the pantry so my dogs love him even more both have had minor health issues since having him and we ve gotten it taken care of stroller in tow pregnant with number two and my belly doesn stop me from getting on the floor to give my big dog his bedtime lovies or carrying my little dog to bed think it about your attitude went through fertility treatments to have my first son and my pets were there for me through it all they were there when needed love here to give them love back now if you don love your pet check your perspective if it doesn change maybe you should find loving home for your dog removed yes that all can focus on too and feel terrible we be going on hikes the dog park and walks if baby wasn here but just burnt out like crazy person trying to keep this baby fed and happy hoping my dogs will forgive me but always make it up with treats do know why you re being downvoted it like people value the mere happiness of pets over the actual health of humans it not your fault you ve developed an allergy sorry you re dealing with this we got our dog when lo was barely two was so excited and then got burned out quick chasing them both and thinking about both their needs are hard it doesn help that she not friendly dog she likes our family and growls at pretty much anyone else so for long time we couldn take her places luckily we have yard so she spends nice days out there and lo throws ball for her inside here the thing unlike babies dogs don need attention 24 it okay to chew bone in the corner or run around the yard for much of the day what ve grown to love is the evening after lo is sound asleep my sweet dog lays at our feet for pets gets special treats goes for late night walks just around the block with us and now that she calmer we take her to the park couple times week and she walks with us or rolls around and chases squirrels while lo swings she joins us for walks in town and gets free cool whip ice cream with us make it practice to take your dog with you anywhere it is allowed let it out at night for cuddles etc and you will fall in love again it takes time to make room in your heart but your new baby will grow up with furry best friend and you are unlikely to regret that right trying to find solution not just giving my pets away same my dog got me through lots of depression and was my friend when had no one and nothing never thought could be that close to another human we did literally everything together even showered together now it not like that at all he doesn want to listen to anyone apparently and the only thing he is ever interested in is our food not getting love or anything he just wants our food and that really annoying thank god my son loves him he year halfish now so he interacts with our dog way more although he has adored him since day one and the dog is amazing with him so that helps lot too miss having that bond with him though but my son takes up almost all of my heart and time want this for him so bad he such an amazing cuddler he so sweet he would be such good cat to someone he could lay and watch birds with how did you go about it did you reach out on your local facebook groups nextdoor and your vet because that how thinking of going about it have you had your baby yet just curious glad you have such good connection with your kitty this is super common ve known bunch of moms who have gone through this with their formerly beloved pets it does pass but it takes some time and if you know someone who would want your dog it might be best to find him new home my sister used to try to compare her love for her cats to my love for my older daughter until she had her son and suddenly now the cats live with our mom lol luckily my mom is doting pet owner so they re better off but still it amazing what hormones can do to your emotions you re doing ok think they know what going on mine german shepherd and she so high energy and demanding but she taking it easy on me she loves the baby this thread was like dodge ball to the face months pregnant with two dogs and cat whom love so much and never thought about that changing hope that can give them good enough attention know my husband will for sure but it makes me so sad to think of me resenting or ignoring these pups maybe now that cognizant of it ll be less likely oh man did craigslist with the plan that wouldn let him go unless it really felt right put price on him to weed out weirdos looking for free cat he was beautiful himalayan so knew could get away with that just got *really* lucky that the first person to contact me was the right person don have facebook and only learned about next door recently but they would be good routes to try for sure when our baby was born asked my sister to take our cat because we just did not have the time to love her the way we used to so and were so sad to see her go but ultimately it was the best decision for all of us as my sister is cat lady who worships her cat babies and we still get regular updates and pictures thank you for posting this have been feeling this way towards my cat and don know why used to treat him like my child before had child and would worry about him if he stayed outside late but almost immediately after having my son just don have those feelings towards him anymore even thought he looked different when got home from the hospital but that could be bc hadn seen him in days it doesn help that he kind of hesitant towards the baby especially when he cries so the cat doesn snuggle up with me as much anymore made me worry bc know people who fear they won love the second child as much as the first but then they do once the second baby is born but in this case don feel the same for my cat as once did baby boy is only weeks so still very dependent and takes up all of my time right now so maybe things will eventually change but totally understand where you re coming from you will find that balance it sleep deprivation as well and well they are added responsibility that you have no energy for it normal once your babes is bit older and becomes fascinated with this furry creature think it ll come back not fully because now there is human child in your life but it ll come back little ❤️ be patient with yourself same here however our year old dog is aggressive towards our baby so dog isn allowed inside anymore and absolutely no where near the baby even while supervised used to love the dog now barely tolerate the dog husband still loves the dog aw thats nice you got bit of time with her am sorry about your cat passing away though one of my cats sleeps directly on top of me so am just concerned she may jump on top of the baby at night and try to sleep and harm him good luck have cats and dog we had them all years before having baby they used to get so much attention from me and loved on them now honestly can not stand the cats like at all find them disgusting and huge inconvenience still like my dog but he does get play time and walks like he used to feel guilty about it but its so hard trying to juggle my year old and all these animals all while being pregnant again ve told my husband that once these animals pass am done also its so great to see other people who had dogs who instantly fell in love with their babies and they became best friends that did happen with us have to supervise diligently because my dog has low patience level for my son
